Title: Understanding America’s economic decline through a wider lens
Summary: Donald J. Trump has reshaped the American political landscape . His actions and rhetoric have often polarised the nation, but one thing is clear: He believes he is acting in the best interest of the United States .

Title: Obi faults VDM’s arrest, alleged NANS president’s abduction
Summary: Peter Obi condemned arrest of Martin Vincent Otse, popularly known as VeryDarkMan (VDM) Peter Obi, 2023 presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), condemned the arrest . He said the action left many Nigerians unsettled .

Title: Defections: Kano gov vows to follow Kwankwaso as Obi’s ally Obaze dumps LP
Summary: Kano gov vows to follow Dr Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso as Obi’s ally Obaze dumps LP . Fresh suspense emerged yesterday over the anticipated switch of the Kwankwaiyya movement .

Title: Rise to lift Africa, Adesina challenges Nigeria
Summary: President and Chairman of the Boards of Directors, African Development Bank (AfDB) Group, Akinwumi Adesina, has said Nigeria will need more rapid economic growth to lift its people out of poverty .

Title: Lagos pays out N1.17bn loans to 4,600 MSMEs in 2024
Summary: Lagos State Employment Trust Fund disbursed N1.17 billion loans to 4600 Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) in 2024 . The state government reports 91% repayment rate .

Title: Manufacturing investments crash by 35% amid rising cost of finance
Summary: Manufacturing investments crash by 35.3 percent in 2024 from N1.018 trillion in 2023 . This was reflected in the Second Half of 2024 (H2’24) Economic Review of the Manufacturers Association of Nigeria .

Title: Crude Curse Demolishes 2025 Budget,  Threatens 2026
Summary: Nigerian leaders in Abuja and at state levels are desperate; even if most Nigerians are not aware of it . Federal and state governments are going broke with each passing day . Most Nigerians go to bed without the vaguest idea about how their economy is being gradually demolished by the crude curse .

Summary: Oluwole Oke said the need to support a Yoruba President and the refusal of Osun State Governor, Ademola Adeleke, to fix decaying infrastructure in his Federal Constituency made him quit the PDP . Oke: "I have won elections in the past simply because I was able to generate employment

Title: Loyalty to Buhari keeps us in APC – CPC ex-state chairmen
Summary: Former state chairmen of the defunct Congress for Progressives Change have declared that their continued stay in the All Progressives Congress is rooted in loyalty to their political leader and former President Muhammadu Buhari . Summary: Senator Opeyemi Bamidele has revealed that the Minister of Education, Dr. Tunji Alausa, played a crucial role in supporting chieftains of the National Democratic Coalition who fled Nigeria during the military regime of the late General Sani Abacha .
